title: Helping Big Businesses Beat Startups
itunes:title: Helping Big Businesses Beat Startups
description:
Mach49 Founder and CEO Linda Yates, discusses her book The Unicorn Within: How Companies Can Create Game-Changing Ventures at Startup Speed.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
